text: Aey eman walo! Farmanbardari kero Allah Taalaa ki aur farmanbardari kero rasool (PBUH) ki aur tum mein say ikhtiyar walon ki. Phir agar kissi cheez mein ikhtilaf kero to ussay lotao Allah Taalaa ki taraf aur rasool ki taraf agar tumhen Allah Taalaa per aur qayamat kay din per eman hai. Yeh boht behtar hai aur ba aetbaar anjam kay boht acha hai
